name: Reverie Seeker
description:
How to Play?

Embark on a brief, art-centric game where you respond to several questions and enjoy the dream that unfolds.
Different personalities will lead to different dreams.

 

 

!!! Please be aware that this game contains flashing images and may not be suitable for individuals with photosensitivity or epilepsy.
